A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rey\, Luke\, and Kylo Ren are the only interesting bits of this movie. Finn is tragically underused and undervalued\, Poe Dameron is made to look like a complete idiot\, the new Admiral is pink-haired and boring\, and the new character Rose is the most annoying character ever introduced in the Star Wars franchise. \n\nAlso\, Snoke? What? Why? How?
